page.title: 01PARK HILL, ALLESLEY, COUNDON
page.content: These areas are situated on the North West of the city of Coventry adjacent to the 'green belt' area between Coventry and Birmingham. Apart from parts of Allesley Village and scattered individual properties the area is mainly one of post second world war suburban development. 1981 census returns indicate it to be an area with a high ratio of owner occupiers (c.85%), with a younger than average population pattern for the city, with relatively low levels of unemployment.{(For more detailed {information refer to 1981 census {returns).}
